law.catch_line: Legislative findings and declarations relating to accessible electronic information for the disabled.
law.history: Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 129, sec. 1, effective July 13, 2004.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/13/2004). 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 129, sec. 4, provides that 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 129, which creates KRS 163.485, 163.487, and 163.489, is to be known as the Accessible Electronic Information Act.
